name: EL Passion
description:
At EL Passion we build digital products for startups, established businesses and corporations worldwide, mainly in the United States and Europe. We cooperate with fast-moving companies in Healthtech, Fintech and Business services industries.
We are a custom software development house with extensive experience in building MVPs and end-to-end products, developing and designing Ruby on Rails Web Apps or feature-rich iOS/Android Apps.
 
Our expertise:
Web and Mobile Dev
UX & UI Design
Concept & Strategy
Key Figures:
300+ delivered projects
20 countries of our customers
60+ team members
 
Over the 8 years we have mastered our processes and consider them a unique value that will benefit your product. We rely on UX, Agile, Lean and XP methodologies to provide best-in-class products and exceptional customer service, no matter the circumstances.
